featured.text: they seize the pupae of the raided nest.
When the Amazons reach the nest of their intended victims, a fierce battle may take place.
Each nest used to have but one queen, but now many mounds are often found with multiple queens.
It’s common to find a nest with over 25,000 workers.

other.text: Franklin ran an iron rod through a hole in the top of each hemisphere so that they could nest together from largest to smallest.
A slave raid starts with an assembly of the Amazon warriors outside their own nest.
Each nest of the red ant has one queen.
When was the first nest of the red ant found in the United States? (A) In 1930s.
search strategies to link their food source to their Normally, the birds enjoy a smooth flight together nests.

definition.zh_def: 巢，指鳥類或其他動物用來孵蛋或養育幼崽的地方，也可指一種結構或層次的安排。
definition.en_def: A structure or place made or chosen by animals for laying eggs or raising their young; can also refer to a layered arrangement.
definition.example: The bird built a nest in the tree to keep its eggs safe.
